document_data.caption: ''The blue dragon, Venfithar.''
document_data.name: Venfithar
document_data.mainbody: '''Venfithar''' was a [[blue dragon]] living in the [[Rothé Valley]] near [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.History: The [[Cult of the Dragon]] allied with him in order to be to store his lightning breath in specialized containers to activate a [[cloud giant]] artifact.
